Name: VRWiz
About the game: In this virtual reality game you are a wizard of incredible power tasked with defending a small village from hordes of monsters. Current Features Include Full Index Controller support with finger tracking Also supports htc vive controllers Four different spells that are cast using finger tracking (Also works with vive controllers) The ability of teleportation Four different monsters One village Several villagers And a bit of scenery
